text:
Hey William, thanks for getting back to me!
The code is actually straight out of the box the `hs create webpack-serverless`. The only addition I’ve included is `node-fetch`. I added it to a <https://github.com/matiasvad/hs-webpack-serverless|repo> so you can take a look.
Regarding beta: That sounds great, please do let me know - I’m eager to get this set up asap, so we can move away from our proxy server :slightly_smiling_face:

im having problems accessing the logs so i can debug an issue with a serverless function
```hs logs --latest```
<@U9F22AQH5> maybe you can take a look at why the webpack setup is not working. <@UCBDLK6SU> I will keep you posted on that beta :thumbsup:

Hey Rohan, you need to include the name of the endpoint when you run the logs command.

So it would look like `hs logs <endpoint> --latest`
Looks like this maybe has something to do with using webpack for BE code <https://github.com/node-fetch/node-fetch/issues/450>
